data.title: Standard A Main Razorvine + Shear
data.description: Use this easy, yet effective combination of utility to make it difficult for Attackers to enter the A Site.

data.title: Sands Door Arc Rose Fight
data.description: Fight for A Main control early into the round with this lineup. This also enables a teammate playing towards A Main to peek aggressively, as they will not be blinded.

data.title: Standard B Main Razorvine + Shear Hold
data.description: Use this easy, but effective combination of utility to prevent Attackers from entering the site easily.

data.title: Early Top B Main Arc Rose
data.description: At the beginning of the round, use this Arc Rose lineup to assist teammates contesting B Main.

data.title: Start Round Arcade Arc Rose
data.description: At the beginning of the round, use this Arc Rose lineup to assist teammates contesting towards Arcade.
